title: A Randomized Open-Label, Placebo-Controlled Multi-Center Study of SMA-668 (SMN2 splicing modifier) in Patients With Hemophilia A
officialTitle: A Randomized Open-Label, Placebo-Controlled Multi-Center Study of SMA-668 (SMN2 splicing modifier) in Patients With Hemophilia A
description: This is a randomized open-label, placebo-controlled multi-center study designed to evaluate the efficacy and safety of SMA-668 (SMN2 splicing modifier) in patients with Hemophilia A. The study will enroll approximately 252 patients.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Adults aged 25-74 years
- Confirmed diagnosis of Hemophilia A
- ECOG performance status 0-1
- Adequate organ function
- Willing and able to provide informed consent

Exclusion Criteria:
- Known hypersensitivity to study drug or excipients
- Pregnant or breastfeeding women
- Participation in another interventional study within 30 days
- Significant cardiovascular disease within past 6 months
- Active or chronic infection requiring systemic treatment
